#define GYRO_TO_OMEGA_FACTOR   0.002556634

scaling factor to calculate the angular speed (omega) from the Gyroscope1 value

from orignal code : OMEGA = ( ( (GYRO-GYRO_zero) / 2048) * 2 * PI * 300) / 360; <=> OMEGA = ( (GYRO-GYRO_zero) * 0.920388) / 360 <=> OMEGA = ( (GYRO-GYRO_zero) * 2.556634E-3

TODO: Needs to be adapted to sensor
